title: Feature Discussion: Dynamic Import from Exec
body:
###Goal
SDK that don't have targets or props, but a tool can generates props/targets.  At the moment, it requires an extra step outside of MSBuild to initialize for MSBuild.  It would be amazing if MSBuild could be the initializer as well.  

###Proposal
Given a tool that can produces MSBuild target files, have MSBuild invoke it then either import it from Pipe or from a cached location. 

```
<Import Project="$(ProjectDir)\Cache\sdk.targets" Execute="sdk.cmd -CreateTarget" ProjectCached="true" />
```

nodes.body: Abandoned as this feature is redesigned into PackageReference.
